original_solution_mapping.L2: The puppy will eat 1/4c three times a day so .25*3= <<.25*3=.75>>.75 cups per day
original_solution_mapping.L3: The puppy will eat .75 cups of food a day for 14 days for a total of .75*14 =<<.75*14=10.5>>10.5 cups
original_solution_mapping.L4: The puppy will then eat `.5 cup of food twice a day so .5*2 = <<.5*2=1>>1 cup per day
original_solution_mapping.L5: The puppy will eat 1 cup of food a day for 14 days for a total of 1*14 = <<1*14=14>>14 cups per day

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5765.
    Returns: the total amount of food the puppy will eat over the next 4 weeks.
    """
    # L1
    days_per_week = 7 # WK
    first_period_weeks = 2 # two weeks starting tomorrow
    days_in_first_period = first_period_weeks * days_per_week

    # L2
    food_per_feeding_first_period = 0.25 # 1/4 cup of food
    feedings_per_day_first_period = 3 # three times a day
    cups_per_day_first_period = food_per_feeding_first_period * feedings_per_day_first_period

    # L3
    total_food_first_period = cups_per_day_first_period * days_in_first_period

    # L4
    food_per_feeding_second_period = 0.5 # 1/2 cup of food
    feedings_per_day_second_period = 2 # twice a day
    cups_per_day_second_period = food_per_feeding_second_period * feedings_per_day_second_period

    # L5
    second_period_weeks = 2 # For the following 2 weeks
    days_in_second_period = second_period_weeks * days_per_week
    total_food_second_period = cups_per_day_second_period * days_in_second_period

    # L6
    food_fed_today = 0.5 # fed him 1/2 cup of food today
    total_food_over_4_weeks = food_fed_today + total_food_first_period + total_food_second_period

    # FA
    answer = total_food_over_4_weeks
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: 1 week has {days_per_week} days so {first_period_weeks} weeks will have {first_period_weeks}*{days_per_week} = <<{days_per_week}*{first_period_weeks}={days_in_first_period}>>{days_in_first_period} days

The puppy will eat 1/4c three times a day so {food_per_feeding_first_period}*{feedings_per_day_first_period}= <<{food_per_feeding_first_period}*{feedings_per_day_first_period}={cups_per_day_first_period}>>{cups_per_day_first_period} cups per day

The puppy will eat {cups_per_day_first_period} cups of food a day for {days_in_first_period} days for a total of {cups_per_day_first_period}*{days_in_first_period} =<<{cups_per_day_first_period}*{days_in_first_period}={total_food_first_period}>>{total_food_first_period} cups

The puppy will then eat `.5 cup of food twice a day so {food_per_feeding_second_period}*{feedings_per_day_second_period} = <<{food_per_feeding_second_period}*{feedings_per_day_second_period}={cups_per_day_second_period}>>{cups_per_day_second_period} cup per day

The puppy will eat {cups_per_day_second_period} cup of food a day for {days_in_second_period} days for a total of {cups_per_day_second_period}*{days_in_second_period} = <<{cups_per_day_second_period}*{days_in_second_period}={total_food_second_period}>>{total_food_second_period} cups per day

She has already fed him {food_fed_today} cup of food and he will eat {total_food_first_period} cups and another {total_food_second_period} cups for a total of {food_fed_today}+{total_food_first_period}+{total_food_second_period} = <<{food_fed_today}+{total_food_first_period}+{total_food_second_period}={total_food_over_4_weeks}>>{total_food_over_4_weeks} cups of food
